eu_initiatives:
Stratégie d'intelligence artificielle, éthique de l'IA, gouvernance des données, stratégie numérique: 
-Artificial intelligence for Europe (COM(2018)0237) 
-Comprehensive European industrial policy on artificial intelligence and robotics (2018/2088(INI)) 
-Artificial intelligence for Europe. Liability for emerging digital technologies. Accompanying document (SWD(2018)0137) 
-Digital Europe programme 2021-2027 (2018/0227(COD)) 
-Towards a common European data space. Guidance on sharing private sector data in the European data economy. Accompanying document (SWD(2018)0125)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The Future Society is a non-profit think and do tank, which aims at addressing the profound consequences of the current technological explosion. Our mission is to help build a future that preserves humanity while harnessing the upsides of technology.
relevant_communication: Global Civic Debate on the Governance of AI (www.aicivicdebate.org)
